full_text:
#LetsGoPens
Told me this dude was a bust & Zucker was much better, LMFAO https://t.co/PeZWHs59cd

All the #LetsGoPens fans that harassed me for saying the Zucker Trade was bad & we should have got Fiala.
They all told me Zucker was so much better.

Fiala is now a legit SuperStar....

Imagine that dude instead of Zucker?

We are a legit Top contender, rite now.

#ImNeverWrong
